name: Rock'n Troll
description:
Fast-paced Action RPG in a medieval fantasy setting with a Rock twist!

Controls:
The game uses only the mouse

  1. Left-click on an enemy to attack, or on a floor tile to move there.
  2. Switch attack between melee/range (hammer/bow) using the button on the bottom left of the screen.
  3. Once you collect enough "retaliation" energy (the blue bar below the red health) the electric shield spell will appear as an icon above the "switch attack" button. Pressing does a little damage to all enemies within its radius.

The current version includes only the action elements, please wait a bit for the RPG side of things :) The game is in development, so feel free to let me know about your new ideas and problems you may face, I'll do my best to fix and include them in future versions!

You may install also the game on android for free on the play store
